data.title: Savyasachi to feature top class VFX
data.meta_description: Telugu cinema news, Movie reviews, OTT News, OTT Release dates, Latest Movie reviews in Telugu, telugu movie reviews, Box office collections
data.text:
Naga Chaitanya’s upcoming thriller, Savyasachi, has wrapped up its entire shooting formalities and the post-production work is underway in full swing. In the movie, Chay essays the role of an ambidextrous man who has a rare ability to effectively do any task with both the hands.

Now, the latest buzz is that the film will feature some top class VFX and they will offer a unique experience. Currently, the computer graphics team is busy giving finishing touches to certain crucial scenes.

Bollywood starlet Nidhhi Agerwal is the film’s leading lady. Tamil star Madhavan and former heroine Bhumika Chawla are essaying crucial roles in the movie. Savyasachi is being directed by Chandoo Mondeti and produced by Mythri Movie Makers. MM Keeravani is the film’s music composer. The film is going to hit the screens on July 12.
